Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
Eva
1. A toy ALGOL-like language used in "Formal Specification of Programming Languages: A Panoramic Primer", F.G. Pagan, P-H 1981.
2. Explicit Vector Language.
Eva, AL (town, FIPS 24688) Location: 34.33042 N, 86.75585 W Population (1990): 438 (171 housing units) Area: 7.4 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 35621 Eva, TN Zip code(s): 38333
